          <title>
            <string language="en">Calculating pressure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rechendruck</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pression calculatrice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pressão calculadora</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pressione calcolatrice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πίεση υπολογισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presión calculadora</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a book, mattress and a man sitting and rocking on a chair. This can be used to calculate pressure.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chair</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">man</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mattress</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rocking</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sitting</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Buch, Matratze und 
einen Mann, der auf einen Stuhl sitzt und schaukelt. Dieses kann
verwendet werden, um Druck zu errechnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un livre, le matelas et
un homme s'asseyant et basculant sur une chaise. Ceci peut être
employé pour calculer la pression.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um livro, o mattress e 
um homem que senta-se e que balança em uma cadeira. Isto pode 
ser usado calcular a pressão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un libro, il 
materasso e un uomo che si siede e che oscilla su una sedia. 
Ciò può essere usata per calcolare la pressione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα βιβλίο, το στρώμα 
και μια συνεδρίαση ατόμων και λίκνισμα σε μια καρέκλα. Αυτό
μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί για να υπολογίσει την πίεση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a un libro, al colchón
y a hombre que se sienta y que oscila en una silla. Esto se 
puede utilizar para calcular la presión.</string>
          </description>
